name: VR SEX
description:
Set in a hotel overlooking Las Vegas, you take on the form of a beautiful woman and enjoy phantom sensations, have sex with beautiful girls, and soak in the nightscape.
Standing doggy sex with Las Vegas in the background is the best feeling ever.
You can also experience walking around outside the room high above the city.

Controls:
You can move around freely. 6DoF supported. You can switch between events by touching the cube.


Persons involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.
